mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(comment_content, job_id, pf_id, user_id) VALUES(#{commentContent}, #{jobId}, #{pfId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: UPDATE comment SET comment_status = 'deleted' WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.comment_id, c.comment_content, u.user_id, u.user_nickname, u.user_profile_img, c.created_at FROM user u LEFT JOIN comment c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.job_id = #{jobId}
AND c.comment_status != 'deleted' ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
